contentList.content:
The number you need to roll a Critical Hit while attacking with Daggers is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

Your crit damage with Daggers is allegedly tripled (kek).
The <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">critical</LSTag> threshold for your dagger attacks is reduced by 1, stackable.
The <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">critical</LSTag> damage you deal with daggers is hopefully tripled.
